You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Offering a giveaway and an exclusive discount is a great way to incentivize participation and show your appreciation for your followers' engagement. Remember to have fun with it and be creative!

To recap, you've got a solid plan in place:

1. Host a Q&A session on Instagram Live, using a hybrid approach to answer pre-submitted and real-time questions.
2. Schedule the session during your followers' most active period, on a Wednesday at 1 pm EST.
3. Promote the event in advance using Instagram's features and a branded hashtag.
4. Offer a giveaway and an exclusive discount to encourage participation and reward engagement.

By following these steps, you'll create a engaging and rewarding experience for your followers. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need further guidance or have any more questions.

Best of luck with your Q&A session, and I hope it's a huge success!
